abilities.name: prophet of an elder god
abilities.description: Illaoi and the Vessels she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, Vessels, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.

abilities.name: tentacle smash
abilities.description: Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.

abilities.name: harsh lesson
abilities.description: Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.

abilities.name: test of spirit
abilities.description: Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a Vessel and begin spawning Tentacles.

abilities.name: leap of faith
abilities.description: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.
